text: Great food,warm ambiance,however as a lunch destination its hit or miss as to whether the place is open

Food was fresh and everything was flavourful. The shrimp was so good.   The people were friendly and welcoming , a homey sort of feeling.  The service a little slow , but we had plenty of time and it was relatively busy.   The Cuban espresso was amazing !!  We will definitely go back .  I know I will back even just for a cup of that wonderful coffee.
If you like Cuban dish you'll love this place. Hector is your host and you will feel comfy in this warm place with great ambiance.  Prices are very reasonable, quality is great.
